Title: Methyltrimethoxysilane (MTMS)-based silica-iron oxide superhydrophobic nanocomposites
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Inc.We report a facile synthesis of superhydrophobic silica-iron oxide nanocomposites via a co-precursor sol-gel process. The choice of the silica precursor (Methyltrimethoxysilane, MTMS) in combination with iron nitrate altered the pore structure dramatically. The influence of iron oxide doping on the structural properties of pristine MTMS aerogel is discussed.
